Uses of Package
com.soa.security.script

  • Packages that use com.soa.security.script 
    Package Description
    com.soa.message.script
    This package includes a scripting API for messages and message exchanges.
    com.soa.process.bpel.runtime.script
    This package includes all objects available in the process related scripts.
    com.soa.security.script
    This package includes a scripting API for identity information both authenticated and unauthenticated.
  • Classes in com.soa.security.script used by com.soa.message.script 
    Class and Description
    SubjectMap
    Map of categories to Subjects.
  • Classes in com.soa.security.script used by com.soa.process.bpel.runtime.script 
    Class and Description
    Subject
    Represents a Subject in a scripted environment.
  • Classes in com.soa.security.script used by com.soa.security.script 
    Class and Description
    BST
    Represents a WS-Security Binary Security Token credential in a scripted environment.
    Name
    Represents name credential in a scripted environment.
    Password
    Represents a password credential in a scripted environment.
    Principal
    Represents a principal in a scripted environment.
    Subject
    Represents a Subject in a scripted environment.
